src:
FOTO: Slovenko (30) na Hrvaškem skoraj obglavilo
Alkotest je bil negativen.
04 Nov 2019, 09:52 by T. V.



Porsche s slovenskimi registrskimi oznakami je uničen. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Porsche s slovenskimi registrskimi oznakami je uničen. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Porsche s slovenskimi registrskimi oznakami je uničen. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek


BRINJE – Voznica (30) porscheja s slovenskimi registrskimi tablicami je imela v soboto veliko sreče v nesreči, ko je s svojim jeklenim konjičkom zletela z avtoceste A1 blizu Brinja. Zaradi prevelike hitrosti se je zaletela v ograjo in povsem uničila avtomobil, ki se je zaril pod kovino, a je kot po čudežu odnesla celo glavo.Hrvaška policija je sporočila, da je šlo za lažjo prometno nesrečo, v kateri ni bilo poškodovanih. Po nesreči je bil alkotest voznice negativen. V nesreči je nastala le materialna škoda, ki pa je bila, sodeč po razbitinah in znamki avtomobila, ogromna.


Porsche s slovenskimi registrskimi oznakami je uničen. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek



Porsche s slovenskimi registrskimi oznakami je uničen. FOTO: Zaslonski posnetek
text:
PHOTO: Slovene (30) in Croatia almost beheaded
The breath test was negative.
04 Nov 2019, 09:52 by T.V.



A Porsche with Slovenian license plates is destroyed. PHOTO: Screenshot



A Porsche with Slovenian license plates is destroyed. PHOTO: Screenshot



A Porsche with Slovenian license plates is destroyed. PHOTO: Screenshot


BRINJE - A driver (30) of a Porsche with Slovenian license plates was lucky on Saturday to crash off a A1 motorway near Brinje with his steel horse. Due to the speeding, she crashed into a fence and completely destroyed the car, which crashed under the metal but miraculously swept her entire head off. After the accident, the driving breathalyzer was negative. The accident only caused material damage, which was, according to the wreckage and make of the car, enormous.


A Porsche with Slovenian license plates is destroyed. PHOTO: Screenshot



A Porsche with Slovenian license plates is destroyed. PHOTO: Screenshot
